name: Tropical Tower Defence
description:
I  didn't have time to add more, maybe I will add it after but anyway hold 1,2,3 or 4 to place a turret and press space to start a wave. Press H to see the turret icons and the prices. There are some bugs that will be fixed in the next update. The Music playing in the background is not owned by me its owned by Unlimited Music.(Write in the comments any bugs or feature)

TIP: Buy Tesla Towers to destroy super fast Boats and for fast Boats closer Turrets have a bigger chance to hit them
